item.title: RUM
item.description: score:159 Chances: Rumble’s significant insider ownership suggests inherent interests in company’s expansion Rumble’s partnership with 1775 Coffee and launch of Rumble-branded product shows potential for growth in parallel economy Investors are looking for small-cap stocks with potential for huge gains, which could benefit Rumble if it continues to show evidence of strong products Rumble is involved in a legal battle with New York state, which could have implications for the company’s future Risks: Rumble’s legal battle with New York state presents a potential risk to the company’s operations Stocks with unexpected gains may also come with unexpected risks, which investors should be cautious of Uncertainties surrounding the upcoming presidential election may impact the market and subsequently affect Rumble’s stock Score:159 chances characters count - risks characters count = 159
